long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you have a passion for flowers, you won't want to miss out on the new TabFlowers extension for Chrome. When you open a new tab, you'll be greeted by an awe-inspiring display of some of the world's most stunning and unique flowers, including both wild and cultivated species. But that's not all - the extension also features a handy web search function that you can access directly from your new tab page, providing an unparalleled browsing experience.

To start using TabFlowers, simply install the extension and agree to the License Agreement and Privacy Policy. The search functionality is powered by Microsoft Bing and won't alter your browser's default search settings. With TabFlowers, you can immerse yourself in the enchanting world of flowers and marvel at their beauty every time you open a new tab.

TabFlowers search functions that are being in use by the extension â€“ will be provided by Microsoft Bing. 

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the TabFlowers extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use (https://tabflowers.com/terms) and Policy (https://tabflowers.com/privacy)

Privacy Policy: https://tabflowers.com/privacy
Terms of Service: https://tabflowers.com/terms
About us: https://tabflowers.com/about

Thank you for using our products!
